protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the conjugation of leukotriene A4 with reduced glutathione to form leukotriene C4.

reference.reference_text: Lam BK, Penrose JF, Freeman GJ, Austen KF: Expression cloning of a cDNA for human leukotriene C4 synthase, an integral membrane protein conjugating reduced glutathione to leukotriene A4. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1994 Aug 2;91(16):7663-7.
Welsch DJ, Creely DP, Hauser SD, Mathis KJ, Krivi GG, Isakson PC: Molecular cloning and expression of human leukotriene-C4 synthase. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1994 Oct 11;91(21):9745-9.

Penrose JF, Spector J, Baldasaro M, Xu K, Boyce J, Arm JP, Austen KF, Lam BK: Molecular cloning of the gene for human leukotriene C4 synthase. Organization, nucleotide sequence, and chromosomal localization to 5q35. J Biol Chem. 1996 May 10;271(19):11356-61.
Bigby TD, Hodulik CR, Arden KC, Fu L: Molecular cloning of the human leukotriene C4 synthase gene and assignment to chromosome 5q35. Mol Med. 1996 Sep;2(5):637-46.
